item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "Start with the end in mind. " -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "Seek first to understand, then to be understood." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "We are free to choose our actions, . . . but we are not free to choose the consequences of these actions." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Steven Covey
item.description: "We are not human beings on a spiritual journey. We are spiritual beings on a human journey." -- Steven Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "The way we see the problem is the problem." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "Most of us spend too much time on what is urgent and not enough time on what is important." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Stephen Covey
item.description: "You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage—pleasantly, smilingly, nonapologetically, to say “no” to other things. And the way you do that is by having a bigger “yes” burning inside. The enemy of the “best” is often the “good." -- Stephen Covey

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "The past has no power over the present moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at the moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Death is a stripping away of all that is not you. The secret of life is to "die before you die" --- and find that there is no death." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life isn't as serious as the mind makes it out to be." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Give up defining yourself - to yourself or to others. You won't die. You will come to life. And don't be concerned with how others define you. When they define you, they are limiting themselves, so it's their problem. Whenever you interact with people, don't be there primarily as a function or a role, but as the field of conscious Presence. You can only lose something that you have, but you cannot lose something that you are." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "This, too, will pass." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but thought about it. Be aware of the thoughts you are thinking. Separate them from the situation, which is always neutral. It is as it is." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Being must be felt. It can't be thought." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Become conscious of being conscious." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Bayhaqi add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Is there a difference between happiness and inner peace? Yes. Happiness depends on conditions being perceived as positive; inner peace does not." -- Eckhart Tolle
